word_mean: 直径，径：经圆心连接圆周对应点的直线的长度。在某一结构(如颅或骨盆)周边二个特定对应点之间的距离

sentence.Network_en: This hole was a scant .23 inches in diameter.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个洞眼的直径只有0.23英寸。

sentence.Network_en: the diameter of a tree trunk
A diameter passes through the center of a circle.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1.直径(diameter) 即钻石腰部圆形水平面的直径。其中最大值称为最大直径，最小值称为最小直径，1/2(最大直径+最小直径.

柱径(Diameter)和柱高的比例随着柱式的性格而变化，并有着不同的表现效果。两者相差越小越粗壮，相差越大越细巧。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French diametre, via Latin from Greek diametros (grammē) ('line) measuring across', from dia 'across' + metron 'measure'

entry.def: The diameter of a round object is the length of a straight line that can be drawn across it, passing through the middle of it.

example.ex: ...a tube less than a fifth of the diameter of a human hair.
example.tran: 直径不足人的头发直径1/5的电子管
一段直径为 22 毫米的钢管

means.word_mean: 1. the length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference
2. a straight line connecting the center of a circle with two points on its perimeter (or the center of a sphere with two points on its surface)
